name: Drunk Pac Man
description:
Welcome to Drunk Pac Man! A fan-game for the popular game, Pac Man!

It seems the player sees the world differently, due to the fact that he is drunk. The notable changes are:

  • Player movement has been changed. Our beloved yellow circle is unable to go in a straight line.
  • Ghosts can now go through walls and have advanced pathfinding:
    1. Ghost known as "Blinky" can travel at enormous speeds but his AI takes time to load.
    2. Ghost known as "Pinky" has consistent movement but has a slower speed.
    3. No information is known at this moment.
    4. No information is known at this moment.
  • Power Pellets have been removed (reason unknown)
  • The Sounds and Screen have been severely tampered with. These items are often glitchy.

Have fun, and try to beat the game as fast as possible!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Movement

R - Restart

ESC - Close Game

Change Log:

-Launched version 1.2 , just a few hours after 1.1. The game has been optimized a little and fixed the deadly bug where the game wasn't winnable.
